A macro is a saved sequence of commands or keystrokes that are stored for later use.
巨集是可以儲存多個命令或多個按鍵順序供之後使用。

。此外，有超過 70 種尚未有本地化版程式介面的語言或方言的<f0>拼寫檢查</f0>、<f1>斷字與禁則處理</f1>、<f2>同義詞典</f2>可以使用。

另外，您也可以付錢取得支援服務。
Although you can learn Basic and write macros, there is a steep learning curve to writing macros from scratch.
雖然你可以學習basci和寫巨集，但是從頭寫巨集是一件陡峭的學習曲線。
An example of a simple macro is one that “types” your address.
"types" 顯示你的位址就是一個簡單的巨集的例子 。

此類對話方塊舉個例，如「尋找與取代」對話方塊。

整理了一些常見問題的答案<f0><br1/>
Anyone who wants to get up to speed quickly with LibreOffice will find this Getting Started Guide valuable.
任何想要快速駕馭 LibreOffice 的人都會認為這本《入門指引》很有價值。
As many as you like.
隨您高興，幾臺皆可。
Base (database
Base (資料庫
Base (database)
Base (資料庫)
Base provides many new features, such as the ability to analyze and edit relationships from a diagram view.
Base 提供許多新功能，例如從圖表檢視中分析與編輯關聯。
Base provides tools for day-to-day database work within a simple interface.
Base 讓您可以用簡單的介面處理日常的資料庫作業。
Based on LibreOffice 4.2.
針對 LibreOffice 4.2 版撰寫。
Calc
Calc
Calc (spreadsheet)
Calc (試算表)
Calc (spreadsheets)
Calc (試算表)
Calc can also export spreadsheets in several formats, including for example Comma Separated Value (CSV), Adobe PDF and HTML formats.
Calc 也將試算表匯出成許多格式，包括 CSV (Comma Separated Value，分號分隔值)、Adobe PDF、HTML 格式等。
Calc generates 2D and 3D charts, which can be integrated into other LibreOffice documents.
Calc 可以製作出 2D 與 3D 圖表，更可以整合到其他 LibreOffice 文件中。
Calc has all of the advanced analysis, charting, and decision making features expected from a high-end spreadsheet.
Calc 擁有高階試算表程式會有的進階分析、圖表、決策判斷等功能。

Finding more information

若想查看更詳盡的解釋，則選取 <f0>說明 > 這是什麼？</f0>，接著再將指標挪到那個圖示上方。

Icons
圖示
If Tips are enabled, place the mouse pointer over any of the icons to see a small box (“tooltip”) with a brief explanation of the icon’s function.
一旦啟用了「提示」，當您將滑鼠指標移動到任何圖示上後，就能看到一個小方塊 (稱為「提示框」) 內有該圖示功能的簡要解釋。
If you do not want to use Java, you can still use nearly all of the features of LibreOffice.
即使您不想使用 Java，您還是可以使用幾乎所有的 LibreOffice 功能。
If you record Calc macros, and the recorder can correctly generate a macro, there is an add-in available which <i0/>converts <i1/>Calc macros when they are recorded.
If you record Calc macros, and the recorder can correctly generate a macro, there is an add-in available which <i0/>converts <i1/>Calc macros when they are recorded.
If you wish, you can change your LibreOffice software package to display Galaxy icons as follows:
若您想要，您也可以將您的 LibreOffice 軟體改以銀河圖示集顯示：

插圖

匯入巨集
Impress (presentations)
Impress (簡報)
Impress is compatible with Microsoft PowerPoint file format and can also save your work in numerous graphics formats, including Macromedia Flash (SWF).
Impress 與 Microsoft PowerPoint 檔案格式相容，也可以把成果以多種圖形格式儲存，包括 Macromedia Flash (SWF)。
Impress provides all the common multimedia presentation tools, such as special effects, animation, and drawing tools.
Impress 提供所有常見的多媒體簡報工具，例如特效、動畫、繪圖工具等。
In <f0>User interface > Icon size and style</f0> select <f1>Galaxy</f1> from the options available in the drop-down list.
在 <f0>使用者介面 > 圖示大小與樣式</f0> 下，從下拉清單中的可用選項裡選取 <f1>銀河</f1>。
In addition, we request that you share with the project some of the profits you make from sales of books, in consideration of all the work we have put into producing them.
此外，考慮到我們製作這本書的苦工，我們希望您能分一些書本的銷售所得回去貢獻本專案。
In addition, you can choose whether to activate Tips, Extended tips, and the Help Agent (using <f2>Tools > Options > LibreOffice > General</f2>).
此外，您可以選擇是否要顯示提示、延伸提示、說明助理等額外功能 (使用 <f2>工具 > 選項 > LibreOffice > 一般</f2>)。
In most cases we do not use the technical terms in this book, but it is useful to know them because the Help and other sources of information often use them.
本書中絕大部分情況下都不會使用技術名稱，但如果能知道技術名稱對您會很有幫助，因為「說明」系統與其他資訊來源都使用技術名稱。
In most cases, you can interact only with the dialog (not the document itself) as long as the dialog remains open.
大多數的情況下，您只有在對話方塊開啟的狀態下才能與該對話方塊 (不是與文件本身) 互動。
Information about available accessibility options.
可用的無障礙輔助選項相關資訊。
International Support
國際支援
International support
國際支援
Introducing LibreOffice
LibreOffice 簡介
Introduction
介紹
Is LibreOffice available in my language?
LibreOffice 有提供我的母語版本嗎？
Is it written in Java?
難道它是用 Java 程式語言寫成的？
It also connects to your email client.
它也能連接到您的電子郵件客戶端。
It also covers some of the features common to all components, including setup and customization, styles and templates, macro recording, and printing.
本書也涵蓋一些所有組件共通的功能，包括設置與自訂、樣式與範本、巨集錄製、列印......等。
It can create and edit forms, reports, queries, tables, views, and relations, so that managing a relational database is much the same as in other popular database applications.
它可以建立與編輯表單、報表、查詢、表格、檢視、關聯...等，因此關聯式資料庫的管理與其他受歡迎的資料庫程式非常類似。
It includes over 300 functions for financial, statistical, and mathematical operations, among others.
包含超過 300 個函式供經濟、統計、數學運算...等用途使用。
It is integrated with the advanced graphics capabilities of LibreOffice Draw and Math components.
它整合了 LibreOffice Draw 的進階圖形功能與 Math 組件。
It provides controls for you to use to specify how to carry out an action.
它提供控制項給您，讓您指定該如何執行某項動作。
Its native file format is Open Document Format (ODF), an open standard format that is being adopted by governments worldwide as a required file format for publishing and accepting documents.
它採用的原生檔案格式是開放文件格式 Open Document Format (ODF)，這是受全世界許多政府採用作為發布文件、收受文件用的開放標準格式。
Its purpose is to inform you of something, or request input from you, or both.
它的用途是通知您某件事，或是請求您輸入資訊，或是兩者兼具。
Java is one of several languages that can be used to extend the software.
Java 只是用來擴展軟體功能的眾多語言之一。
Jean Hollis Weber
Jean Hollis Weber
LibreOffice > Preferences
LibreOffice > 偏好設定
LibreOffice can also open and save documents in many other formats, including those used by several versions of Microsoft Office.
LibreOffice 也可以開啟、儲存其他格式的文件，包括許多 Microsoft Office 所使用的那些格式版本。
LibreOffice comes with an <i0/>extensive Help system.
LibreOffice 本身就自附<i0/>內容廣泛的「說明」系統。
LibreOffice has been translated (localized) into over 40 languages, so your language probably is supported.
LibreOffice 已經翻譯 (本地化處理) 成超過 40 種語言，因此您所說的語言很可能已經支援了
LibreOffice includes the following <i0/>components.
LibreOffice 包含下列<i0/>組件。
LibreOffice is a freely available, fully-featured office productivity suite.
LibreOffice 是個可免費分送、功能全備的辦公生產力套裝軟體。
LibreOffice is developed and maintained by volunteers and has the backing of several organizations.
LibreOffice 是由志工開發與維護，並且有許多組織在背後支持。
LibreOffice is distributed under the <is0/>Open Source Initiative (OSI)<ie1/> approved Lesser General Public License (LGPL).
LibreOffice 是根據 <is0/>開源協會 (OSI，Open Source Initiative)<ie1/> 所批准的 Lesser General Public License (LGPL) 授權方式散布軟體。
LibreOffice is not written in Java; it is written in the C++ language.
LibreOffice 並不是用 Java 語言撰寫的；實際上它是以 C++ 程式語言寫成。
LibreOffice macros are usually written in a language called <i0/>LibreOffice Basic, sometimes abbreviated to <is1/>Basic<ie2/>.
LibreOffice 巨集通常用稱為<i0/>LibreOffice Basic寫成的，有時也可簡稱為 <is1/>Basic<ie2/>。
LibreOffice runs on Windows, Linux, and Mac OS X operating systems, each of which has several versions and can be customized by users (fonts, colors, themes, window managers).
LibreOffice 可在 Windows、Linux、Mac OS X 作業系統上執行，每個作業系統都有不同的版本，而且使用者也可以自訂一些設定 (字型、色彩、佈景主題、視窗管理員等)。

Mac 對應
Macro organization
巨集組織架構
Macro recorder failures
巨集錄製器失敗
Macros are very useful when you have to repeat the same task in the same way over and over again.
當您一直重覆某些任務/工作時巨集十分有用。

郵遞論壇

May I distribute LibreOffice to anyone?
我是不是可以把 LibreOffice 散布給任何人使用？
May I distribute the PDF of this book, or print and sell copies?
我可以散布這本書的 PDF 檔嗎？或者是印刷出來並且販賣其複製品？
May I sell it?
我能販售 LibreOffice 嗎？
May I use LibreOffice in my business?
我可以在商業事務中使用 LibreOffice 嗎？
May I use programming code from LibreOffice in my program?
那我可以在我的程式中使用 LibreOffice 的程式代碼嗎？

修改目前的選單
Note
注意
Note for Mac users
Mac 使用者請注意
Note: Java is available at no cost.
註：Java 執行時期環境是免費提供的。
On Linux and Windows operating systems, go to <f0>Tools > Options >LibreOffice > General</f0> on the main menu bar to open the dialog for general options.
Linux 與 Windows 作業系統，前往主選單列上的 <f0>工具 > 選項 > LibreOffice > 一般</f0> 來開啟一般用選項的對話方塊。
On Linux and Windows operating systems, go to <f0>Tools > Options >LibreOffice > View</f0> on the main menu bar to open the dialog for view options.
Linux 與 Windows 作業系統，前往主選單列上的 <f0>工具 > 選項 > LibreOffice > 檢視</f0> 來開啟檢視用選項的對話方塊。
On a Mac operating system, go to <f0>LibreOffice > Preferences > General</f0> on the main menu bar to open the dialog for general options.
Mac 作業系統，前往主選單列上的 <f0>LibreOffice > 偏好設定 > 一般</f0> 來開啟一般選項用的對話方塊。
On a Mac operating system, go to <f0>LibreOffice > Preferences > View</f0> on the main menu bar to open the dialog for view options.
Mac 作業系統，前往主選單列上的 <f0>LibreOffice > 偏好設定 > 檢視</f0> 來開啟檢視用選項的對話方塊。

其他由使用者架設的網站有的也有提供免費秘訣和教學。

付費支援與教育訓練

請見 <t0>1</t0> 與這頁網頁：<a1>http://www.libreoffice.org/get-help/</a1>

Select <f0>Use LibreOffice dialogs</f0> in <f1>Open/Save dialogs</f1> and, in Linux and Mac OS X operating systems only, <f2>Print dialogs</f2> to display the LibreOffice dialogs on your computer display.
選取 <f1>開啟和儲存的對話方塊</f1> 中的 <f0>使用 LibreOffice 對話方塊</f0>；而 Linux 與 Mac OS X 作業系統中還能以 LibreOffice 對話方塊來顯示 <f2>列印對話方塊</f2> 。
Service contracts can be purchased from a vendor or consulting firm specializing in LibreOffice.
您可以跟廠商購買服務合約，或諮詢對 LibreOffice 有專攻的公司。
Slideshows can be further enhanced using Fontwork special effects text, as well as sound and video clips.
投影片放映還可以用字型美工的特效文字、聲音、視訊剪輯來增添效果。
Some Linux operating systems, for example Ubuntu, include LibreOffice as part of the installation and may not include the Galaxy set of icons.
有些 Linux 作業系統，例如 Ubuntu，雖然預裝 LibreOffice 但卻可能不含銀河圖示集。
Some dialogs can be left open as you work, so you can switch back and forth between the dialog and your document.
有些對話方塊可以在您工作時繼續維持開啟狀態，這樣您就能在對話方塊與文件之間前後切換。
Some keystrokes and menu items are different on a Mac from those used in Windows and Linux.
Mac 上的一些按鍵與選單項目與 Windows 及 Linux 不同。
Spin box (click the up and down arrows to change the number shown in the text box next to it, or type in the text box).
調整方塊 (點按上箭頭或下箭頭可以改變其旁邊文字方塊內的數字，也可以直接在文字方塊內輸入)
Tabbed page (not strictly speaking a control).
分頁 (嚴格來說這說不上是種控制項).
Table <seq0>1</seq0>: Free support for LibreOffice users
表格 <seq0>1</seq0>：LibreOffice 使用者的免費支援
The Java JDK/JRE is only required for some features.
有些功能需要有 Java JDK/JRE 才能執行，
The LGPL <i2/>license is available from the LibreOffice website: <a3>http://www.libreoffice.org/download/license/</a3>
LGPL <i2/>授權書可以從 LibreOffice 網站上查看：<a3>http://www.libreoffice.org/download/license/</a3>
The LibreOffice community not only develops software, but provides free, volunteer-based support.
LibreOffice 社群不只開發軟體而已，更提供免費、志工性質的支援。
The LibreOffice macro language is very flexible, allowing automation of both simple and complex tasks.
LibreOffice 巨集語言十分彈性，允許簡單及複雜任務的自動化。
The LibreOffice website in your language.<br0/>
以您母語建立的 LibreOffice 網站
The Scenario Manager provides “what if” analysis.

The examples covered in this chapter are created using the macro recorder and the dispatcher.
The examples covered in this chapter are created using the macro recorder and the dispatcher.
The final code manipulates LibreOffice objects rather than generating dispatches.
The final code manipulates LibreOffice objects rather than generating dispatches.
The first step in learning macro programming is to find and <i0/>use existing macros.
學習巨集程式的第一步是找到及 <i0/>使用現有的巨集。
The icons in this guide have been taken from a LibreOffice installation that has been set to display the Galaxy set of icons.
本指引中所採用的圖示都由 LibreOffice 本身提供，我們設定的是「銀河」圖示集。
The icons used to illustrate some of the many tools available in LibreOffice may differ from the ones used in this guide.
有些 LibreOffice 中某些工具的圖示可能會與本指引中所採用的不同。
The illustrations in this guide were taken from a variety of computers and operating systems.
本指引中所有用的插圖是從不同電腦與不同作業系統中擷取的。
The macro recorder records the generated dispatches.
The macro recorder records the generated dispatches.
The macro recorder works by recording the commands that are dispatched (see “<f0><rf1>Dispatch framework</rf1></f0><f2>” on page </f2><f3><rf4>13</rf4></f3>).
巨集編輯器的運作是記錄發送的命令 (參閱 “<f0><rf1>Dispatch framework</rf1></f0><f2>” 頁面 </f2><f3><rf4>13</rf4></f3>) 。
The most notable one is the HSQLDB relational database engine.
其中最著名的有 HSQLDB 關聯式資料庫引擎。

<t1>圖 1</t1> 中列出常見的控制項技術名稱。.

The terms used in LibreOffice for most parts of the <i0/><f1>user interface</f1> (the parts of the program you see and use, in contrast to the behind-the-scenes code that actually makes it work) are the same as for most other programs.
LibreOffice 中<i0/><f1>使用者介面</f1> (程式中您所實際看見且能操控的部份，與之相反的是幕後實際讓程式運作的程式代碼) 採用的絕大部分詞語與其他大多數的程式相同。
The usual methods for a beginner are to use macros that someone else has written or use the built-in macro recorder, which records keystrokes and saves them for use.
The usual methods for a beginner are to use macros that someone else has written or 使用內建巨集錄製器, which records keystrokes and saves them for use.
Therefore, some illustrations will not look exactly like what you see on your computer display.
因此有些插圖可能看起來與您電腦上所顯示的不完全相同。

本書將介紹以下這些 LibreOffice 的主要組件：
This book is adapted and updated from <f0>Getting Started with OpenOffice.org 3.3</f0>.
本書是由<f0>《Getting Started with OpenOffice.org 3.3》</f0>改作而來。
This book was written by volunteers from the LibreOffice community.
本書是由 LibreOffice 社群的志工所撰寫。

This book, the other LibreOffice user guides, the built-in Help system, and user support systems assume that you are familiar with your computer and basic functions such as starting a program, opening and saving files.
包括本書、其他 LibreOffice 使用者指引、內建的說明幫助系統、使用者支援系統等，皆假定您熟悉電腦基本操作，並瞭解運用開啟程式、開啟檔案、儲存檔案等基本功能。

本章節是基於 <f0>OpenOffice.org 3.3 入門指引</f0>的第13章

若要使用 LibreOffice 對話方塊：
To display the full Help system, press <f0>F1</f0> or select <f1>LibreOffice Help</f1> from the Help menu.
若要顯示完整的「說明」系統，請按下 <f0>F1</f0> 鍵，或是從「說明」選單中選取「<f1>LibreOffice 說明</f1>」。
To start, check out this webpage: <a0>http://www.documentfoundation.org/contribution/</a0>
想要開始貢獻，就來看看這篇網頁：<a0>http://www.documentfoundation.org/contribution/</a0>

和其他按鍵一同使用 (修飾鍵)

When you close the dialog after use (usually, clicking <f0>OK</f0> or another button saves your changes and closes the dialog), then you can again work with your document.
一旦您用完後關閉了對話方塊 (通常是點按<f0>「確定」</f0>，或是其他儲存變更並關閉對話方塊的按鈕)，那麼您就會返回文件繼續您的編輯作業。

巨集儲存的地方?

何處可取得更多幫助

本書適合誰讀？

Windows or Linux
Windows 或 Linux
Writer (word processing)
Writer (文書處理)
Writer (word processor)
Writer (文書處理)
Writer can export files to HTML, XHTML, XML, Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF), and several versions of Microsoft Word files.
Writer 可以將檔案匯出成 HTML、XHTML、XML、Adobe 可攜式文件格式 (PDF，Portable Document Format)，以及許多 Microsoft Word 的檔案格式版本。
Writer is a feature-rich tool for creating letters, books, reports, newsletters, brochures, and other documents.
Writer 是多功能的工具，可以建立信件、書本、報告、新聞通訊、小手冊、還有其它類型的文件。
Writing macros without the recorder
不透過巨集錄製器編寫巨集
Yes, as long as you meet the requirements of one of the licenses in the copyright statement at the beginning of this book.
可以，只要您遵循本書開頭著作權聲明中的那些要求即可。
Yes.
可以。
You can also open and work with Microsoft Excel workbooks and save them in Excel format.
您也可以開啟並處理 Microsoft Excel 工作簿，再以 Excel 格式儲存。
You can either use dialogs from your computer system (default) or dialogs provided by LibreOffice.
您可以使用您電腦系統上的對話方框 (預設)，或是 LibreOffice 提供的對話方塊。
You can get comprehensive <i0/>online support from the community through mailing lists and the Ask LibreOffice website.
您可以<i0/>透過郵遞論壇以及 Ask LibreOffice 網站，從社群取得詳細的線上支援。
You can help with the development and user support of LibreOffice in many ways, and you do not need to be a programmer.
您可以透過許多方式來幫助 LibreOffice 的開發與使用者支援，無需特別成為一位程式設計師。
You can insert graphics and objects from other components into Writer documents.
在 Writer 文件中您可以插入圖形，也可以從其他組件入物件。
You can write information on a piece of paper so that you can look at it later.
您可以在一張紙上寫下資訊之後可以看。
You do not have to request special permission.
您並不需要特別申請許可。
You may be new to office software, or you may be familiar with another office suite.
您或許是第一次接觸辦公用軟體，又或者是已經熟悉其他套辦公套裝軟體。

You may distribute or modify it under the terms of either the GNU General Public License (<a0>http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html</a0>), version 3 or later, or the Creative Commons Attribution License (<a1><f2>http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/</f2></a1>), version 4.0 or later.

您可以遵循 GNU General Public License (<a0>http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html</a0>) 第三版或後續版本，抑或是遵循 Creative Commons Attribution License (<a1><f2>http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/</f2></a1>) 第四版或後續版本的授權方式，散布、或修改本著作。
You may, within the parameters set in the <is0/>LGPL<ie1/>.
可以的，只要遵循 <is0/>LGPL<ie1/> 所設立的條款即可。
You should be able to download the Galaxy icon set from the software repository for your Linux operating system.
您應該可以從您 Linux 作業系統提供的軟體庫中，另行下載銀河圖示集並安裝。
